code: var SET_LEAGUE='SET-LEAGUE';var initialState=null;var periodReducer=function periodReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(action.type===SET_LEAGUE){state.league=action.league;console.log("SET-LEAGUE="+action.league);}return state;};export var setLeagueCreator=function setLeagueCreator(text){return{type:SET_LEAGUE,league:text};};export default periodReducer;
